name: gov-text-grid
label: 文本宫格
codeSnap:
<view>
    <view class="preview-caption">有竖分割线</view>
    <gov-text-grid
        list="[{
            title: '逻辑',
            desc: '辅助信息'
        },
        {
            title: '生物',
            desc: '辅助信息'
        },
        {
            title: '地理',
            desc: '辅助信息'
        }]"
        title-color="#f42e2e"
        column-num="3"
        binditemclick="gridItemClick(e) {
        console.log('e', e);
    }">
    </gov-text-grid>
</view>

demoCode.s:
<view>
    <view class="preview-caption">默认效果</view>
    <gov-text-grid
        list="{{listHasLine}}">
    </gov-text-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">四等分</view>
    <gov-text-grid
        list="{{listFour}}"
        title-color="#f42e2e"
        column-num="4"
        binditemclick="gridItemClick">
    </gov-text-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">有竖分割线</view>
    <gov-text-grid
        list="{{listHasLine}}"
        title-color="#f42e2e"
        column-num="{{columnNum}}"
        binditemclick="gridItemClick">
    </gov-text-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">标题在辅助信息上</view>
    <gov-text-grid
        list="{{listTitleTop}}"
        title-color="#f42e2e"
        has-line="{{false}}"
        column-num="{{columnNum}}"
        binditemclick="gridItemClick">
    </gov-text-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">标题在辅助信息下</view>
    <gov-text-grid
        list="{{listTitleDown}}"
        title-color="#f42e2e"
        column-num="{{columnNum}}"
        has-line="{{false}}"
        title-on-top="{{false}}"
        has-hover="{{false}}"
        binditemclick="gridItemClick">
    </gov-text-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">自定义样式文本宫格</view>
    <gov-text-grid
        gov-top-title="gov-top-title"
        gov-top-desc="gov-top-desc"
        list="{{listSelf}}"
        title-color="#f42e2e"
        column-num="{{columnNum}}"
        binditemclick="gridItemClick">
    </gov-text-grid>
</view>

attributes.name: title-on-top
attributes.description: 标题在辅助信息上，默认是

attributes.name: binditemclick
attributes.description: 点击宫格每一项的事件

attributes.name: has-line
attributes.description: 是否有竖分隔线，默认有

events.name: itemclick
events.description: 点击宫格每一项的事件, 可以通过e事件对象, e.detail.index获取到每一项的索引值

externalClasses.name: gov-grid-item
externalClasses.description: 整体宫格外层的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变其的样式，如内边距

externalClasses.name: gov-inner-grid-item
externalClasses.description: （标题+辅助信息）的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变其的样式，如背景色

externalClasses.name: gov-top-title
externalClasses.description: 标题在辅助信息上的title扩展样式类，可以通过此class改变其外层的样式，如设置字大小：font-size: 60px

externalClasses.name: gov-down-title
externalClasses.description: 标题在辅助信息下的title扩展样式类，可以通过此class改变其外层的样式，如设置字体颜色：color: #999

externalClasses.name: gov-top-desc
externalClasses.description: 标题在辅助信息上的desc的扩展样式，可通过此class改变其外部的样式，如设置字大小：font-size: 60px

externalClasses.name: gov-down-desc
externalClasses.description: 标题在辅助信息下的desc的扩展样式，可通过此class改变其外部的样式，如设置字体颜色：color: #999
